textBox.richText: Member of the biometric team from Nov 2011 to June 2015. PostDoc on face recognition. Involved in the project BBfor2 and EMMA1. After nearly 4 years at Idiap working on face recognition, Manuel ( https://www.idiap.ch/~mguenther/ ) is leaving the team. Manuel is one of the great contributor to BOB ( http://idiap.github.io/bob/ ) and developed the BOB face recognition library ( https://pypi.python.org/pypi/facereclib ). Manuel goes to the University of Colorado at Colorado Spring to work with Terry Boult ( http://www.vast.uccs.edu/~tboult/index.html ) on a project funded by the IARPA JANUS program ( http://www.iarpa.gov/index.php/research-programs/janus ). No doubt that the expertise Manuel gained over those years in the Biometrics group at Idiap will be useful for this project.
